name: Pass the Luck
desc: Mualani's specialty. Feet planted on her surfboard, dish in hand, she made not one, not two, but three loops around you before placing the sizable lobster before you. "Ta-da! Super huge and freshly caught — a stroke of luck if ever there was one! And now, I pass that luck onto you!" Her cheerful words all but grant the bean balls wrapped around the shrimp a golden glow.

customize.name: Fried Shrimp Beanballs
customize.desc: A deep-fried snack. First, deep fry the bean flour balls, then stuff them with fillings, fried shrimp, and sauce. Though they may be slightly complicated to prepare, the fact that they're so delicious makes it all worth it.

customize.name: Mualani
customize.desc: A well-known guide in Natlan who owns a watersports shop, and expert in all forms of wave-chasing.

customize.name: Pass the Luck
customize.desc: Mualani's specialty. Feet planted on her surfboard, dish in hand, she made not one, not two, but three loops around you before placing the sizable lobster before you. "Ta-da! Super huge and freshly caught — a stroke of luck if ever there was one! And now, I pass that luck onto you!" Her cheerful words all but grant the bean balls wrapped around the shrimp a golden glow.

customize.name: Glabrous Beans
customize.desc: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Shrimp Meat
customize.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

value.text: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
